import sys

def factorial(n):
    producto = n
    for x in range(1,n):
        producto = producto * x
    return producto

def catalan(n):
    return factorial(2*n)/(factorial(n+1)*factorial(n))

if __name__ == "__main__":
    raw_input()
    for x in sys.stdin:
        if int(x) <= 1000:
            print catalan(int(x)-1) % 10000
